sense.gloss: to throw at, to fling at, to hurl at, to throw (someone) down
to hurl (abuse, insults, etc.) at, to use (rough language) with (someone)

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑椅子↑↓いす↓の↑上↑↓じょう↓に↑上着↑↓うわぎ↓を↑投↑↓|な↓げつける|と↑部屋↑↓へや↓に↑突進↑↓とっしん↓した。
sdata.e: She flung her coat on the chair and stormed into the room.
